1.title: Hot Fun in the Summertime
1.plot: The Swan family kicks off their summer wedding season at their dream home-turned-wedding venue. Eldest daughter Ashley coordinates the events, mom Judy strives to execute her beautiful floral visions, dad Tom spins wedding standards as DJ Dr. Smoove and younger daughter Lesley act as the glue that holds it all together. Together, the family races against the clock to pull off incredible wedding-day surprises for a Great Gatsby-themed ceremony, including a '20s-style speakeasy and special request for a rare roadster to ferry the couple into marital bliss.

2.title: The Eye of the Storm
2.plot: The Swans have to create a fairy tale wonderland for their enchanted vow renewal, complete with a horse-drawn carriage and spectacular ice castle. Tom races to get ordained so he can officiate the ceremony, only to be silenced by a glitch in the sound system. All the while, storm clouds darken the horizon, threatening the ultimate wedding day disaster.

3.title: Trouble in Paradise
3.plot: When a local firefighter and his fiancee ask to transform the Swanderosa into a tropical paradise, it's Lesley's big chance to show she can coordinate as well as her big sister. She implements her new schedule in order to keep everyone on task in accomplishing special touches ranging from a Tiki lounge to a processional in a full-sized fire engine. But a special visitor in Judy's flower shop could throw everything into chaos.

4.title: I'll Do It My Way
4.plot: A couple's bizarre request for live peacocks in their ceremony has Ashley busting her tail feathers to get a pair of the rare birds cross-country. Judy's event design goes into overdrive to make the day perfect in light of the father of the bride's failing health. And the family must navigate a communication breakdown with a local event planner that could spoil the whole affair.

imdb.plot outline: The Swan family has started a wedding and event planning business right in their own backyard. With dad, Tom, as the technical expert, mom, Judy, as the florist, the youngest daughter, Lesley, as the handy-person and daughter Ashley running the show, the Swans host three days of events every weekend on their property. On top of Ashley's work for the family business, she is also the glue that keeps the family together, as well as a mother to two children of her own.
imdb.title: Swanderosa
